### _In the Godoy Maceira GroupLet us feel **proud to be canteiros** ,_  _two of the oldest professions in the world and historically_  _linked to Vila do Porriño._

#### In the Godoy Maceira GroupWe are **proud to be stonemasons** ,   one of the oldest trades in the world and historically   linked to the town of O Porriño.

**Gomacons** is the group's division dedicated to stone laying. It has its **own Architecture and Construction Management department.**

**Mámoa Deseños Vivos** is the Group's

exhibition and sales space in the center of Vigo.

Making the **replica of Antonio Palacios' temple** for the Madrid Metro is perhaps the greatest responsibility we have ever faced.

[Former](https://godoymaceira.es/#) [Following](https://godoymaceira.es/#)

[1](https://godoymaceira.es/#) [2](https://godoymaceira.es/#) [3](https://godoymaceira.es/#) [4](https://godoymaceira.es/#)

[![](http://www.godoymaceira.es/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/icono_diagonal.png)](https://godoymaceira.es/#)

#### [WHO WE ARE](https://godoymaceira.es/\#)

At Grupo Godoy Maceira, we **specialize in the design, transformation, production, restoration, and installation of all types of natural stone works.**

In recent years, we've moved toward the production of **custom-made pieces.** Almost any shape, size, and design can be achieved in stone thanks to the technological innovations we offer at Godoy Maceira with our competent team of professionals.

Stone is a unique material because of all that it has meant in **our culture throughout history.**

[![](http://www.godoymaceira.es/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/icono_oficio.png)](https://godoymaceira.es/#)

#### [JOB](https://godoymaceira.es/\#)

We are stonemasons, a trade historically linked to the town of O Porriño.

![Ancient stonemasons](http://www.godoymaceira.es/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/canteros_antigua.jpg)

[![](http://www.godoymaceira.es/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/icono_experiencia.png)](https://godoymaceira.es/#)

#### [EXPERIENCE](https://godoymaceira.es/\#)

More than 40 years of experience in the stone sector.

![](http://www.godoymaceira.es/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/canteros_nueva.jpg)

[](https://godoymaceira.es/#)

#### [TECHNOLOGY](https://godoymaceira.es/\#)

At the forefront of technological innovation in our equipment.

![](http://www.godoymaceira.es/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/tecnologia.jpg)

[![](http://www.godoymaceira.es/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/icono_diagonal.png)](https://godoymaceira.es/#)

Functional

Functional

Functional cookies help to perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collect feedbacks, and other third-party features.


Performance

Performance

Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors.


Analytics

Analytics

Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc.

In the Godoy Maceira GroupLet us feel proud to be canteiros ,
two of the oldest professions in the world and historically
linked to Vila do Porriño.

In the Godoy Maceira GroupWe are proud to be stonemasons ,
one of the oldest trades in the world and historically
linked to the town of O Porriño.

Gomacons is the group's division dedicated to stone laying. It has its own Architecture and Construction Management department.

Mámoa Deseños Vivos is the Group's
exhibition and sales space in the center of Vigo.

Making the replica of Antonio Palacios' temple for the Madrid Metro is perhaps the greatest responsibility we have ever faced.

FormerFollowing
1234

WHO WE ARE

At Grupo Godoy Maceira, we specialize in the design, transformation, production, restoration, and installation of all types of natural stone works.

In recent years, we've moved toward the production of custom-made pieces. Almost any shape, size, and design can be achieved in stone thanks to the technological innovations we offer at Godoy Maceira with our competent team of professionals.

Stone is a unique material because of all that it has meant in our culture throughout history.

JOB

We are stonemasons, a trade historically linked to the town of O Porriño.

EXPERIENCE

More than 40 years of experience in the stone sector.



TECHNOLOGY

At the forefront of technological innovation in our equipment.

LATEST PROJECTS

Madrid Metro

Oliva Palace,
Old Town of Vigo
